name: hlmulid
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈ c2, (1[c3]c1)= c1, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cns, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ NrmCVec ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(.sOLD ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(nat1, c3, c1), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cns, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CHilOLD ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(1[c3]c1)= c1)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(.sOLD ` c0)

comment: Hilbert space scalar multiplication by one. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
